page.title: 06SILVER BIRCH NURSERIES.
page.content: Situated on{St.Asaph Avenue}these nurseries were built in 1965 and the owners have been in business for 34 years.At present 7 people are employed.The nurseries cover 3.5 acres,one quarter of an acre for bird sheds and one quarter of an acre of greenhouses,the remainder being cultivated land and storage sheds.Over 80 types of plants are sold,the most popular being{fuchsias}and{geraniums.} { In addition 200 different types of{ {tropical birds}are sold,the most popular being{cockateels and budgerigars.Some tropical fish are also sold.Most customers are personal callers but there are also some mail order sales.
